test_cases.description: Patient developed a surgical site infection after delayed discharge.
test_cases.patient_payload: [MD 2025-01-01T11:00Z]: Patient Sarah Johnson, a 15-year-old female with idiopathic scoliosis, underwent posterior spinal fusion surgery on December 28, 2024. Discharge was delayed due to concerns over wound drainage observed on post-op day 3. The patient was ultimately discharged on January 1, 2025. However, she returned to the ER on January 5, 2025, with signs of a surgical site infection, including increased erythema and drainage from the incision site.

required_provenance: concerns over wound drainage observed on post-op day 3
returned to the ER on January 5, 2025, with signs of a surgical site infection
